Veteran actor '''Philip Stone''' (born '''Philip Stones''') ([[14 April|April 14]], [[1924]] - [[15 June|June 15]], [[2003]]) provided the voice of [[Théoden]] in [[The Lord of the Rings (1978 film)]].
